description:
Scene 4: Alone By The Fire ...
Kaden shows up for the fourth time and I've got a fire going in the living room and he says he'd like to stroke it by the fire. So, I turn a spotlight on over him and we do a solo lit mostly by the flames of the fire. This is a hot scene as we watch him progress even more and continue to get more and more comfortable. He takes things a bit slower in this session as he rubs and caresses every inch of his hot body for us. As usual we get some aggressive stroking and hot moaning and wonderful ass displays as Kaden warms us next to the fire. Our web master calls this an Artsy scene as it looks so sultry and unexpected. In fact, I'd not planned on shooting him the night he stopped by for this one, but when he saw the fire burning he wanted to do a special shoot. You'll be as glad as I was that he wanted to do this.
title: Kaden
